title: Scope
context: ARTICLE 8 UNAUTHORIZED INSURERS AND SURPLUS LINES Cross References Insurance policies issued to construction professionals, see ยง431:1-217. PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS ยง431:8-101 Scope. This article shall apply to the placement of insurance in insurers not authorized to transact insurance in the state in which the subject resident is located or in which the insurance contract will be performed. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 2011, c 68, ยง4]
